attributes.action: Provide satelite or freview channels to cover learning languages and social skills
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: that the goverment could fund channels on sky and freeview that cover learning of french spanish german, and other languages as well as social skills for young adults and information about health topics including obesity, diet drink etc and community skills as well as information on cubs scouts guides and other such organisations , also science channels

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
